text: Icchokas Meras (8 October 1934 - 13 March 2014) was a Lithuanian-Israeli writer and screenwriter. On 6 December 2010, he was awarded the Lithuanian National Prize. He was born in Kelmė, Šiauliai County. He was Jewish and survived the Holocaust. Meras died in Tel Aviv, Israel.
